Come save me for I am miserable.

I havent had a decent night's sleep in two weeks. Its always dreams of armaggeadon. Its getting old and frustrating.

I hate knowing my friends are making terrible choices in life and  expecting me to be alright with it.

I wish I could make people realize that the world will only get better by moving forward instead of dreaming of the past.

I am going to attempt to get a job in the morning but I do not have a lot of faith in that maneuver.

I am trying to figure out my triumphant return to Canada though this time I doubt I will be picking fights with security guards in Toronto since it will be meand not me plus 18 others haha.

Three cheers to those drinking themselves to death and three cheers to those who wish death to eat their eyes.
I have my heart and I won't turn back again.

Go Sox. Fuck the Yankees.

So Yea I hate where I work but I dont hate the work if that makes sense. I have finally gotten over some of my stessed out madness and have calmed down. I know this is nothing more then a midlife crisis. It will pass. I am not going to die soon and the world is vast and wonderous and out there to be explored.
I fucked up. I move on. I am going to survive.
Now it is time for me to move and try and fend on my own. I want to live outside of Clarksville. I want to learn at a community college so I can pad my grades even if it comes out of my own pocket from now on. I want to buy a new car and live with people I dont want to stab every single night of the week.
Soooo...I am going to move. But its not going to be tomorrow. I dont have enough money saved up yet plus Im blowing 200 on a tattoo ala early xmas gift.
Plus why dont girls make any fucking sense?? This is in general not anyone specifically. I think this popped up at work when I was trying not to stick a spoon through the eye of this dumb waitress type female. hahah oh well another long day......
well the gas light is fading fast....
.dead.
